column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " After I leave here today , I 'm gon na free Uncle Iroh from his prison and I 'm gon na beg for his forgiveness .
#Text=And maybe he can pass down to you the ways of tea and failure .
#Text=" Zuko says : " But I 've come to an even more important decision .
#Text=I 'm going to join the Avatar and I 'm going to help him defeat you .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Really ?
#Text=Since you 're a full - blown traitor now and you want me gone , why wait ?
#Text=I 'm powerless .
#Text=You 've got your swords .
#Text=Why do n't you just do it now ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Because I know my own destiny .
#Text=Taking you down is the Avatar 's destiny .
#Text=Goodbye .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Coward !
#Text=You think you 're brave enough to face me , but you 'll only do it during the eclipse .
#Text=If you have any real courage , you 'll stick around until the sun comes out .
#Text=Do n't you want to know what happened to your mother ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " What happened that night ?
#Text=" Ozai says : " My father , Fire Lord Azulon , had commanded me to do the unthinkable to you , my own son , and I was going to do it .
#Text=Your mother found out and swore she would protect you at any cost .
#Text=She knew I wanted the throne and she proposed a plan , a plan in which I would become Fire Lord and your life would be spared .
#Text="
